definition: secondary/auxiliary/deputy/assistant/vice-/abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb/classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: Sobyanin confirmed as new Moscow mayor.
sentences.chinese: 普京副手索比亚宁接任莫斯科市长。

sentences.english: Flame Prison is an elementalist off-hand dagger skill.
sentences.chinese: 烈焰牢狱是元素使副手匕首技能。

sentences.english: He's the sheriff at Twin Gulch, Idaho, and I'm his deputy.
sentences.chinese: 他是爱达荷州特温加尔奇的治安官，我是他的副手。

sentences.english: His deputy reckons half of Pardhi men are criminal.
sentences.chinese: 他的副手则认为一半的帕蒂人是罪犯。

sentences.english: Dragon's Tooth is an elementalist off-hand dagger skill.
sentences.chinese: 龙牙是元素使副手匕首技能。

sentences.english: Dai Li would be the SACO director, Miles his deputy.
sentences.chinese: 戴笠会是中美合作所的指挥，迈尔斯为其副手。

sentences.english: He became deputy to the head of Yeltsin\'s general-affairs department.
sentences.chinese: 他成为叶利钦的不管部副手。

sentences.english: Using whirlwind while dual wielding now deals damage from both mainhand and offhand weapons.
sentences.chinese: 双持时使用旋风现在主手和副手武器都能产生伤害。

sentences.english: But then he let Mr Ozawa snipe at him from the campaign sidelines.
sentences.chinese: 但是他会使小泽一郎从他的选举副手转为敌手。

sentences.english: As we filed outside, the sergeant stood by the door with his assistant.
sentences.chinese: 我们列队的时候，中士和他的副手就站在门边。

sentences.english: In the fall kennedy sent richard goodwin over to serve as woodward 's deputy.
sentences.chinese: 秋季，肯尼迪派理查德古德温去担任白德沃德的副手。

sentences.english: Then Hackenberg asked his deputies, "What do we do now?"
sentences.chinese: 当时哈肯伯格问自己的副手说，“我们该怎么办？”

sentences.english: He would place his former aides in positions of influence.
sentences.chinese: 他的几位前任副手都被他委以重任。
德斯穆克的副手也提出辞职。

sentences.english: Troll Male off-hand items are now the same size as the main hand item.
sentences.chinese: 男性巨魔现在副手武器的大小和主手武器一样了。

sentences.english: If our delegate is unable to attend, we shall have to call on his deputy's services.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们的代表不能出席，我们就请他的副手代劳。

definition: aids and advisors of top officials
under one's control or administration/subordinates/(money etc) on hand/sb's financial means/to take action
senior official/senior officer/commanding officer/CL:位[wei4]/sir (term of address for senior officer)
